## Rules

[[grid]]
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **Purpose**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| |  Tooltip provides additional information element on hover or focus.
|
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **Color recipes**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| |  Background `colorRecipe600`
